org.magiclib.campaign

Class MagicFleetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magiclib.campaign.MagicFleetBuilder

  • public class MagicFleetBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a fleet with a defined flagship and optional escort.
    Since:
    0.46.0
    Author:
    Wisp

      • setFleetFaction

        public MagicFleetBuilder setFleetFaction(java.lang.String fleetFaction)
        Default: MagicVariables.BOUNTY_FACTION ("ML_bounty").

      • setFleetType

        public MagicFleetBuilder setFleetType(@Nullable
                                      @Nullable java.lang.String fleetType)
        campaign.ids.FleetTypes, defaults to FleetTypes.PERSON_BOUNTY_FLEET

      • setFlagshipName

        public MagicFleetBuilder setFlagshipName(@Nullable
                                         @Nullable java.lang.String flagshipName)
        Default: automatically picked by the game.

      • setFlagshipVariant

        public MagicFleetBuilder setFlagshipVariant(java.lang.String flagshipVariant)
        Default: picks the first ship in the fleet after it has been sorted.

      • setFlagshipAlwaysRecoverable

        public MagicFleetBuilder setFlagshipAlwaysRecoverable(boolean flagshipAlwaysRecoverable)
        Default: false.

      • setFlagshipAutofit

        public MagicFleetBuilder setFlagshipAutofit(boolean flagshipAutofit)
        Whether the flagship will be autofitted. When false, the Flagship does not receive D-mods or S-mods from the quality override. Default: false.

      • setCaptain

        public MagicFleetBuilder setCaptain(@Nullable
                                    @Nullable com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.PersonAPI captain)
        Can be null for a random captain, otherwise use MagicCampaign.createCaptainBuilder()

      • setSupportFleet

        public MagicFleetBuilder setSupportFleet(@Nullable
                                         @Nullable java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> supportFleet)
        Map Optional escort ship variants and how many of each to create. Default: no preset support fleet.

      • setSupportAutofit

        public MagicFleetBuilder setSupportAutofit(boolean supportAutofit)
        Whether the preset ships will be autofitted. When false, the preset ships do not receive D-mods or S-mods from the quality override. Default: false.

      • setMinFP

        public MagicFleetBuilder setMinFP(int minFP)
        Minimal fleet size, can be used to adjust to the player's power. Set to -1 to ignore. Default: current player fleet FP.

      • setReinforcementFaction

        public MagicFleetBuilder setReinforcementFaction(java.lang.String reinforcementFaction)
        Reinforcement faction, if the fleet faction is a "neutral" faction without ships Default: fleetFaction.

      • setQualityOverride

        public MagicFleetBuilder setQualityOverride(@Nullable
                                            @Nullable java.lang.Float qualityOverride)
        Ship quality override. Default: 2 (no D-mods) if null or <0.

      • setSpawnLocation

        public MagicFleetBuilder setSpawnLocation(@Nullable
                                          @Nullable com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken spawnLocation)
        Where the fleet will spawn. Default: assignmentTarget. If assignmentTarget is also not set, the fleet will not be spawned.

      • setAssignment

        public MagicFleetBuilder setAssignment(@Nullable
                                       @Nullable com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.FleetAssignment assignment)
        com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.FleetAssignment. Default: orbit aggressive.

      • setAssignmentTarget

        public MagicFleetBuilder setAssignmentTarget(@Nullable
                                             @Nullable com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.SectorEntityToken assignmentTarget)
        Where the fleet will go to execute its order. Default: spawnLocation. If spawnLocation is also not set, the fleet will not be spawned.

      • setIsImportant

        public MagicFleetBuilder setIsImportant(boolean isImportant)
        Default: false.

      • setTransponderOn

        public MagicFleetBuilder setTransponderOn(boolean transponderOn)
        Default: false.

      • setVariantsPath

        public MagicFleetBuilder setVariantsPath(@Nullable
                                         @Nullable java.lang.String variantsPath)
        If not null, the script will try to find missing variant files there. Used to generate fleets using cross-mod variants that won't be loaded otherwise to avoid crashes. The name of the variant files must match the ID of the variant.
